mapper.insert: insert into s_sys_user (id, account, pwd, sex, phone, trueName, createTime, updateTime, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select u.*, l.user_uuid, r.total from s_sys_user u left join r_sysuser_user_rel l ON u.id = l.sysuser_uuid left join r_user_coin r ON l.user_uuid = r.user_uuid where u.id = #{id};
